content.rendered:
Blue Volta an action adventure game with a deep narrative.
It features extraordinary evocative settings and fully freehand drawn graphics.
The player will take Zeno, The Last Librarian, through a life-changing trip. The quest for an ancient volume will steal Zeno away from the sleepy routine of the Citadel of Knowledge. Along the way, he will confront ancient secrets and explore mysterious places teeming with wondrous creatures and interesting characters, brilliant dialogues and a ton of choices.
